CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Four bridging dithiophene units with the atoms of carbon ( C ) , silicon ( Si ) , germanium ( Ge ) and nitrogen ( N ) afford cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene ( CPDT ) , dithienosilole ( DTS ) , dithienogermole ( DTG ) and dithieno [ 3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole ( DTP ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. Carbon (C)
2. Silicon (Si)
3. Germanium (Ge)
4. Nitrogen (N)
5. Cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT)
6. Dithienosilole (DTS)
7. Dithienogermole (DTG)
8. Dithieno [3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP)

These are the material names mentioned in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Cyclopenta[2,1-b;3,4-b′]dithiophene (CPDT)
2. Dithienosilole (DTS)
3. Dithienogermole (DTG)
4. Dithieno [3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP)

These are the material names clearly referred to in the given paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| Dithienosilole (DTS) |
| Dithienogermole (DTG) |
| Dithieno [3,2- b : 2′,3′-d]pyrrole (DTP) |
